data.title: Other systems' station codes
data.meta_description: The UK railway is full of codes. This is a list of CRS, NLC, TIPLOC and STANOX codes: Crossrail's and Metrolink's related systems
data.text:
These systems have codes similar to CRS, STANOX or TIPLOC codes and are used for stations, some junctions and some tunnel portals. As can be seen, not all features have known codes. If you can provide any further details, please contact the editor . London Transport has numerous other systems that have their own page.

Manchester Metrolink

Station codes

The first column gives codes applied to stations early in the system's development. It appears that the system has since fallen out of favour, hence the many gaps. The second column comes from an unknown source. Comparison with the national network CRS codes shows many similarities but not all apply there or apply to Metrolink stops (e.g. SHU that is Shudehill here but is Stonehouse on the national network). Finally, the third column contains codes derived from Transport for Greater Manchesterâs 'Real-Time Open Data Portal'. The three lists bear little resemblance to each other, thus it appears that Metrolink 'started afresh' each time a new system was developed.

Other asset codes

These codes come from an incomplete list of CCTV assets. They form part of a standard naming scheme, though some assets are Metrolink and some are TfGM responsibility. Only tramway and railway assets (or those that might be) are shown here; though the scheme extends beyond these to car parks, bus stations, etc. It will be seen that some codes coincide with those above. This is probably coincidental as the vast majority are very different.

Location Code Abraham Moss Metrolink Stop ABM Ashton Moss Metrolink Stop ASM Bowker Vale Metrolink Stop BKV Bury Interchange BRI Cornbrook Metrolink Stop CNK Derker Metrolink Stop DER East Didsbury Metrolink Stop EDD Flixton Rail Station FLX Hollinwood Metrolink Stop HOL HTY Park & Ride HTY Irlam Rail Station ILM MediaCityUK Metrolink Stop MEC Metrolink Trafford Depot TRD Navigation Road Metrolink Stop NAV Oldham Mumps Metrolink Stop OHM Piccadilly Gardens Metrolink Stop PCG Radcliffe Metrolink Stop RAD Rochdale Interchange ROI Rochdale Rail Station Metrolink Stop ROC Sale Road Metrolink Stop SAL Shaw and Crompton Metrolink Stop SHC Shudehill Interchange SHI Whitefield Metrolink Stop WFD Woodlands Road Metrolink Sub Station WDS Wythenshawe Interchange WYI

Translink (Northern Ireland)

Alphanumeric codes apply to stations only. Two-letter codes also apply to some other assets.
